skillTree.name: Elven Steed
skillTree.description: The best of all horse breeds found anywhere in the world, Elven steeds are noble, intelligent, graceful, and swift.

skillTree.name: Ithilmar Chariot
skillTree.description: Excellent Elven chariots, barded with priceless Ithilmar for extra protection on the battlefield but at no cost in speed or agility.

skillTree.name: Lileath's Blessing
skillTree.description: Those facing a great challenge, a difficult decision, or simply in need of luck, may call upon the Goddess of Dreams and Fortune.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Arcane Finesse
skillTree.description: Few races possess the magical prowess required to bend the Winds to their will without shattering their soul. The Asur are one of them.

skillTree.name: One With the Aethyr
skillTree.description: Both phoenixes and practiced mages have an innate connection to the Winds.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -7% for Phoenix units
Vigour loss reduction: -15% for Phoenix units
Vigour loss reduction: -25% for Phoenix units

skillTree.name: White Tower Sage
skillTree.description: She could likely fill an entire section of the Library with her knowledge, should she ever choose to leave the battlefield and return home.

skillTree.name: Distinguished Teacher
skillTree.description: Her calming presence can instill patience and wisdom into even the most impetuous White Tower aspirant.

skillTree.name: Warding of Qhaysh
skillTree.description: Weaving all of the winds into a protective ward, the mage protects all nearby Asur from magical attacks.

skillTree.name: Hoeth's Blessing
skillTree.description: Those who seek greater understanding will find Hoeth's favour, and can pray to him for divine grace.

skillTree.name: Secrets of Mirai
skillTree.description: The tragic fate of all Elven souls not bound to the Great Forest or protected by waystones is to suffer for eternity in the Black Pit. Those who understand this will not allow the Pale Queen a chance to seize their soul.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1% for all spells
Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Winds of Magic cost: -3% for all spells
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Winds of Magic cost: -6% for all spells
Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: High Magic: Asuryanâ€™s Grace
skillTree.description: Asuryanâ€™s silver bow and its golden arrows strike alongside the Asur.

skillTree.name: High Magic: Binding Mark
skillTree.description: The Asur mage sears an imprint of the eight Winds of Magic onto his enemy that marks him for doom.

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

ui_effects.description: âž• Increase to power reserves by 10
âž• Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Amber Spear
skillTree.description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Transformation of Kadon
skillTree.description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Great Eagle, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.description: âž• Summons a Great Eagle unit
âž• Powerful unit ideal for combat
âž– Summoned units degrade over time
âž– Spawned unit fights in this battle only
âž• Summons a Great Eagle unit
âž• Powerful unit ideal for combat
âž– Summoned units degrade over time
âž– Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: âž• Increase to power reserves by 15
âž• Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -1
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -3
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -6

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, the winds can be harnessed to empower even the soldierâ€™s mundane weapons.

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this oneâ€™s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Meddler
skillTree.description: This one can never leave something alone. They always have to meddle.

skillTree.name: Builder
skillTree.description: Much of the Ulthuan skyline built over the last thousand years is down to this oneâ€™s sterling endeavours.

skillTree.name: Administrator
skillTree.description: If it requires accuracy and organisation, this one is your Elf. Not so much fun at parties, however.

skillTree.name: Incompetent
skillTree.description: There's usually a right way and a wrong way to do anything. This one generally gets it wrong.

skillTree.name: Dealer
skillTree.description: "Too late, too late!" will be the cry, when the one with the bargains passes you by.

skillTree.name: Entrepreneur
skillTree.description: "There's always a way - always an angle. You just have to find it."

skillTree.name: Luddite
skillTree.description: Machinery - and indeed progress of any kind - is anathema to this one, because there's no substitute for good, honest toil.

skillTree.name: Thinker
skillTree.description: Fortunately, there are some who really apply themselves to the problems of the world. Just as well, otherwise we'd beâ€¦ Oh wait...

skillTree.name: Genius
skillTree.description: An individual of exceptional skill and worth; the very embodiment of sagacity.

skillTree.name: Uniped
skillTree.description: They say two are better than one. They are, of course, totally wrong in every respect.

skillTree.name: Spry
skillTree.description: Impressively energetic for a thousand years old - even by their own reckoning.

skillTree.name: Limber
skillTree.description: "Staying this supple takes effort. You donâ€™t get definition like that by sitting about and drinking."

skillTree.name: Peaky
skillTree.description: Looking "not too well" has become a permanent condition. Clearly, they're lacking essential herbs.

skillTree.name: Fortuitous
skillTree.description: Chance is like magic - it can be harnessed to the individual's will.

skillTree.name: Protected
skillTree.description: "If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."

skillTree.name: Enervated
skillTree.description: If ever there was a candidate for a relaxing break at an all-inclusive spa, it was this one.

skillTree.name: Primed
skillTree.description: Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.

skillTree.name: Conductor
skillTree.description: Through their veins a charge is racing. Energy, filling the ominous void within.

ui_effects.description: âž• Calls down 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 25 25 explosion damage (8m)
âž• Calls down 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 25 25 explosion damage (8m)

skillTree.name: Inhibited
skillTree.description: This one doesn't even relax in their own company, so reserved is their nature.

skillTree.name: Dampener
skillTree.description: Definitely not the life and soul of the party; they exude melancholy and depression.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

skillTree.name: Negator
skillTree.description: Not every cloud has a silver lining.

ui_effects.description: âž• 25% chance to deal 7 direct damage to 18 entities per second
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 7 direct damage to 18 entities per second
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

skillTree.name: Flustered
skillTree.description: Cool, calm, and collected. Yeah, right!

skillTree.name: Resistant
skillTree.description: Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.

skillTree.name: Protective
skillTree.description: Whatever quality is needed to stand guard over the Asur way of life, this one has it in abundance.

skillTree.name: Ridiculed
skillTree.description: Fortitude? Strength of character? Do me a favour - this yellow-bellied poltroon has none.

effects.description: Recruitment duration: +1 turn for Phoenix units (minimum 1)

skillTree.name: Flammable
skillTree.description: Tempers, like wicks, can be ignited. Watch the anger burn.

skillTree.name: Incendiary
skillTree.description: You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire - it's explosive to say the least!
